Text: Releasing this as is would put everyone at risk| as well as ruin our reputation if the flaw is discovered. But the client says they need the release ASAP and won't be happy.
Option1: I have to stay back with Employee 1 overnight and get the team to start working on this flaw in the morning too. We will miss the deadline.
Option2: We should go ahead with the release and hope the flaw doesn't present itself.
Option3: Make a bandage fix| restricting or limiting part of the product. Start working on an update fixing the flaw| communicating this with the client.
